steps.action: Press “Win + E” keys, open File Explorer, go to the folder where “cmdextension.msi” locates
Download "test_toast.ps1" from attachments, and place it under the same folder
In file explorer, click on “File -> Open Windows PowerShell -> Open Windows PowerShell as administrator”
Wait 10 minutes, run command: .\test_toast.ps1 (if the script fails to run due to powershell execution policy, then run command first: Set-ExecutionPolicy Bypass)
A sample toast UX will be popped up at the bottom right corner of the screen.
steps.expected: Verify the popup's layout is the same as the image in "Discussion".

steps.action:
Open file explorer, go to %ProgramData%\Microsoft\CMDExtension\Logs. 
Open "UserNotificationsPlugin.log"
steps.expected:
Verify below contents are in the log.

- The UX input is : {"TemplateType":"sampleTemplate"
- DisplayUserNotification is waiting for the UX to be closed
